AphroditeWeaponBoon.name: Flutter Strike
AphroditeWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks deal more damage to nearby foes.

AphroditeSpecialBoon.name: Flutter Flourish
AphroditeSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials deal more damage to nearby foes.

AphroditeCastBoon.name: Rapture Ring
AphroditeCastBoon.description: Your Casts inflict Weak, and damage foes while dragging them toward the center.

AphroditeSprintBoon.name: Passion Rush
AphroditeSprintBoon.description: Rushing damages surrounding foes and inflicts Weak, and again once you stop.

AphroditeManaBoon.name: Glamour Gain
AphroditeManaBoon.description: You automatically inflict Weak on nearby foes and gradually restore Magick near them.

HighHealthOffenseBoon.name: Shameless Attitude
HighHealthOffenseBoon.description: You deal more damage. While you have at least 80% Health, the bonus is doubled.

HealthRewardBonusBoon.name: Spiritual Affirmation
HealthRewardBonusBoon.description: Gain Max Health and Max Magick now and for the rest of this night.

DoorHealToFullBoon.name: Healthy Rebound
DoorHealToFullBoon.description: Whenever you exit a Location, restore 100% Health if you have not lost too much.

ManaBurstBoon.name: Heart Breaker
ManaBurstBoon.description: Whenever you use 40 Magick, create a Heartthrob.

ElementalDodgeBoon.name: Wispy Wiles
ElementalDodgeBoon.description: Gain a chance to Dodge for each Air you have.

RandomStatusBoon.name: Nervous Wreck
RandomStatusBoon.description: Whenever you inflict Weak, also randomly inflict Curses from other Olympians.

ApolloWeaponBoon.name: Nova Strike
ApolloWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks deal more damage in a larger area.

ApolloSpecialBoon.name: Nova Flourish
ApolloSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials deal more damage in a larger area.

ApolloCastBoon.name: Solar Ring
ApolloCastBoon.description: Your Casts inflict Daze, and deal a burst of damage before they expire.

ApolloSprintBoon.name: Blinding Rush
ApolloSprintBoon.description: Your Sprint is faster and inflicts Daze on surrounding foes.

ApolloManaBoon.name: Lucid Gain
ApolloManaBoon.description: If you stand in your Casts when they expire, immediately restore Magick.

ApolloRetaliateBoon.name: Light Smite
ApolloRetaliateBoon.description: After you take damage, your foe takes damage and you inflict Daze on all foes in the vicinity.

PerfectDamageBonusBoon.name: Perfect Image
PerfectDamageBonusBoon.description: You deal more damage until you take damage. If you take no more for 15 Sec., regain this.

ApolloBlindBoon.name: Back Burner
ApolloBlindBoon.description: Foes with Daze take more damage if struck from behind.

ApolloExCastBoon.name: Prominence Flare
ApolloExCastBoon.description: After your Omega Cast expires, rapidly deal damage in the area for 2 Sec.

ApolloCastAreaBoon.name: Super Nova
ApolloCastAreaBoon.description: Your Casts expand in size until they expire.

DoubleStrikeChanceBoon.name: Extra Dose
DoubleStrikeChanceBoon.description: Your Attack has a chance to hit 2 times.

ElementalRallyBoon.name: Self Healing
ElementalRallyBoon.description: While you have at least 3 Fire, whenever you take damage, restore some Health.

DoubleExManaBoon.name: Exceptional Talent
DoubleExManaBoon.description: Your Omega Attack and Omega Special fire 2 times, but use more Magick.

DoubleExManaBoon_Torch.name: Exceptional Talent
DoubleExManaBoon_Torch.description: Your Omega Attack fires 2 times, but uses more Magick.

AresWeaponBoon.name: Vicious Strike
AresWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks deal more damage and inflict Wounds.

AresSpecialBoon.name: Vicious Flourish
AresSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials deal more damage and inflict Wounds.

AresCastBoon.name: Sword Ring
AresCastBoon.description: Your Casts create a falling blade over each foe in the binding circle.

AresSprintBoon.name: Stabbing Rush
AresSprintBoon.description: Your Dash creates a row of falling blades along your path.

AresManaBoon.name: Grisly Gain
AresManaBoon.description: Striking foes with your Weapon may spill Plasma, which also restores 10 Magick.

AresExCastBoon.name: Meat Grinder
AresExCastBoon.description: Your Omega Cast also creates a Blade Rift in the binding circle.

RendBloodDropBoon.name: Profuse Bleeding
RendBloodDropBoon.description: Whenever foes with Wounds take damage, they may spill Plasma.

AresStatusDoubleDamageBoon.name: Grievous Blow
AresStatusDoubleDamageBoon.description: Foes with Wounds may suffer 200% damage when struck.

BloodDropRevengeBoon.name: Visceral Impact
BloodDropRevengeBoon.description: Afer you take damage or a foe is slain, spill Plasma, sometimes twice.

MissingHealthCritBoon.name: Mutual Destruction
MissingHealthCritBoon.description: Gain a chance to deal 200% damage that increases the less Health you have remaining.

LowHealthLifestealBoon.name: Blood Spree
LowHealthLifestealBoon.description: While you have less than 40 Health, your Attacks and Specials restore Health.

OmegaDelayedDamageBoon.name: Cut Above
OmegaDelayedDamageBoon.description: Your Omega Moves also cause a falling blade to appear over each foe stroke, but use +5 Magick.

ElementalOlympianDamageBoon.name: Rallying Cry
ElementalOlympianDamageBoon.description: While you have at least 8 Earth, any of your damaging effects from Olympians are stronger.

DoubleBloodDropBoon.name: Sanguinary Savor
DoubleBloodDropBoon.description: Any Plasma spilled has improved potency and is drawn to you automatically.

DemeterWeaponBoon.name: Ice Strike
DemeterWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks deal more damage and inflict Freeze.

DemeterSpecialBoon.name: Ice Flourish
DemeterSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials deal more damage and inflict Freeze.

DemeterCastBoon.name: Arctic Ring
DemeterCastBoon.description: Your Casts inflict Freeze and repeatedly deal damage to foes in the binding circle.

DemeterSprintBoon.name: Frigid Rush
DemeterSprintBoon.description: Your Sprint forms a Gust around you that lingers after you stop.

DemeterManaBoon.name: Tranquil Gain
DemeterManaBoon.description: After remaining inactive for 0.5 Sec., rapidly restores Magick until you act.

CastNovaBoon.name: Arctic Gale
CastNovaBoon.description: Your Casts also create a Gust at the binding circle.

PlantHealthBoon.name: Plentiful Forage
PlantHealthBoon.description: Whenever you gather resources from a Location, restore Health. Receive 1 Mystery Seed now.

BoonGrowthBoon.name: Steady Growth
BoonGrowthBoon.description: Whenever you clear enough Encounters, a random Boon you have gains Rarity.

ReserveManaHitShieldBoon.name: Snow Queen
ReserveManaHitShieldBoon.description: Gain a barrier that stops 1 instance of damage in each Location, but you Prime Magick.

SlowExAttackBoon.name: Weed Killer
SlowExAttackBoon.description: Your Omega Attack deals more damage, but uses +10 Magick.

CastAttachBoon.name: Local Climate
CastAttachBoon.description: Your Omega Cast deals more damage. If you are in the binding circle, the bonus is doubled.

ElementalDamageCapBoon.name: Frosty Veneer
ElementalDamageCapBoon.description: While you have at least 6 Water, whenever you would take at least 20 damage, take less.

InstantRootKill.name: Winter Harvest
InstantRootKill.description: Freeze-afflicted foes shatter at 10% Health, dealing damage in the area.

HephaestusWeaponBoon.name: Volcanic Strike
HephaestusWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks can cause a blast that deals 400 damage in the area.

HephaestusSpecialBoon.name: Volcanic Flourish
HephaestusSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials can cause a blast that deals 500 damage in the area.

HephaestusCastBoon.name: Anvil Ring
HephaestusCastBoon.description: Your Casts deal damage 3 times in succession to foes in the binding circle.

HephaestusSprintBoon.name: Smithy Rush
HephaestusSprintBoon.description: If a foe is near after you Dash, you can cause a blast that deals 200 damage in the area.

HephaestusManaBoon.name: Tough Gain
HephaestusManaBoon.description: Whenever you take damage, shrug some of it off and restore 150 Magick.

MassiveDamageBoon.name: Grand Caldera
MassiveDamageBoon.description: Your blast effects from Hephaestus deal more damage and are 50% larger.

AntiArmorBoon.name: Molten Touch
AntiArmorBoon.description: Your Attacks and Specials deal bonus damage to Armor.

HeavyArmorBoon.name: Heavy Metal
HeavyArmorBoon.description: Your Weapon deals more damage based on 20% of your Armor, and you gain some now.

ArmorBoon.name: Trusty Shield
ArmorBoon.description: Whenever you enter a Location, gain Armor for that Location, but you Prime 30 Magick.

EncounterStartDefenseBuffBoon.name: Security System
EncounterStartDefenseBuffBoon.description: At the start of each Encounter, you gain Armor that lasts for 7 Sec.

ManaToHealthBoon.name: Uncanny Fortitude
ManaToHealthBoon.description: Gain bonus Health based on your Magick limit.

MassiveKnockupBoon.name: Furnace Blast
MassiveKnockupBoon.description: Your blast effects from Hephaestus also inflict Glow on foes.

ElementalDamageBoon.name: Martial Art
ElementalDamageBoon.description: Your Attack and Special deal more damage for each Earth you have.

WeaponUpgradeBoon.name: Premium Service
WeaponUpgradeBoon.description: Your Aspect of the Nocturnal Arms is even stronger.

HeraWeaponBoon.name: Sworn Strike
HeraWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks deal more damage and inflict Hitch.

HeraSpecialBoon.name: Sworn Flourish
HeraSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials deal more damage and inflict Hitch.

HeraCastBoon.name: Engagement Ring
HeraCastBoon.description: Your Casts inflict Hitch and immediately deal damage based on foes in the binding circle.

HeraSprintBoon.name: Nexus Rush
HeraSprintBoon.description: Your Sprint inflicts Hitch on contact with foes, and deals damage when it does.

HeraManaBoon.name: Born Gain
HeraManaBoon.description: Whenever you run out of Magick, Prime until the next Location to restore all Magick.

DamageShareRetaliateBoon.name: Extended Family
DamageShareRetaliateBoon.description: Your damaging effects from Olympians are stronger for each Boon-giver you have.

LinkedDeathDamageBoon.name: Dying Wish
LinkedDeathDamageBoon.description: Whenever Hitch-afflicted foes are slain, damage all other Hitch-afflicted foes.

BoonDecayBoon.name: Bridal Glow
BoonDecayBoon.description: Make 1 random Boon become Heroic and give it +Lv.

DamageSharePotencyBoon.name: Hereditary Bane
DamageSharePotencyBoon.description: Your Hitch effects deal more damage and last +5 Sec.

SpawnCastDamageBoon.name: Rousing Reception
SpawnCastDamageBoon.description: Your Casts damage any foes as they join the Encounter, wherever they appear.

CommonGlobalDamageBoon.name: Uncommon Grace
CommonGlobalDamageBoon.description: While none of your other Boons are Common, deal more damage.

OmegaHeraProjectileBoon.name: Fine Line
OmegaHeraProjectileBoon.description: Your Omega Moves create a fissure that deals damage in a long line, but use +15 Magick.

ElementalRarityUpgradeBoon.name: Proper Upbringing
ElementalRarityUpgradeBoon.description: While you have at least 2 Earth, Water, Air and Fire Elements, all your Common Boons gain Rarity.

AllElementalBoon.name: All Together
AllElementalBoon.description: Gain Earth Water Air and Fire Elements, and 1 Infusion Boon for each.

HestiaCastBoon.name: Smolder Ring
HestiaCastBoon.description: Your Casts repeatedly inflict Scorch on foes in the binding circle.

HestiaSprintBoon.name: Heat Rush
HestiaSprintBoon.description: Your Sprint leaves a cinder trail, and any damage you take from burning is reduced to 1.

HestiaManaBoon.name: Cardio Gain
HestiaManaBoon.description: Whenever your Attack or Special deal damage, restore Magick.

OmegaZeroBurnBoon.name: Highly Flammable
OmegaZeroBurnBoon.description: Whenever you inflict Scorch on a foe for the first time, inflict more.

CastProjectileBoon.name: Glowing Coal
CastProjectileBoon.description: Hold Cast to aim a fireball that explodes on impact. The binding circle forms there.

FireballManaSpecialBoon.name: Controlled Burn
FireballManaSpecialBoon.description: Your Omega Special also launches a fireball, but uses +10 Magick.

BurnExplodeBoon.name: Flash Fry
BurnExplodeBoon.description: Your foes perish in a blast that damages any surrounding foes.

BurnArmorBoon.name: Hot Pot
BurnArmorBoon.description: Gain a chance to Dodge, which is doubled against Scorch-afflicted foes.

AloneDamageBoon.name: Snuffed Candle
AloneDamageBoon.description: You deal more damage to foes that are nowhere near other foes.

ElementalBaseDamageBoon.name: Slow Cooker
ElementalBaseDamageBoon.description: Your Attacks and Specials gain Power the more Fire you have.

BurnSprintBoon.name: Fire Away
BurnSprintBoon.description: Your Casts destroy many foes' ranged shots, and inflict Scorch on the attacking foes.

PoseidonWeaponBoon.name: Wave Strike
PoseidonWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks hit foes with a splash that knocks other foes away.

PoseidonSpecialBoon.name: Wave Flourish
PoseidonSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials hit foes with a splash that knocks other foes away.

PoseidonCastBoon.name: Tidal Ring
PoseidonCastBoon.description: Your Casts also immediately hit foes with a powerful splash that inflicts Froth.

PoseidonSprintBoon.name: Breaker Rush
PoseidonSprintBoon.description: Whenever you Sprint, hit the first foe you run into with a blast that knocks foes away.

PoseidonManaBoon.name: Flood Gain
PoseidonManaBoon.description: Your Omega Moves make you briefly restore any Magick you use, repeatable after 8 Sec.

EncounterStartOffenseBuffBoon.name: Hydraulic Might
EncounterStartOffenseBuffBoon.description: At the start of each Encounter, your Attacks and Specials are stronger for 10 Sec.

RoomRewardBonusBoon.name: Buried Treasure
RoomRewardBonusBoon.description: Any Minor Finds and Gold are worth more, and you receive Gold, Health, and Bones now.

FocusDamageShaveBoon.name: High Surf
FocusDamageShaveBoon.description: Hit surrounding foes with a powerful splash as they start to strike, but you Prime 30 Magick.

DoubleRewardBoon.name: Sea Star
DoubleRewardBoon.description: Whenever you claim rewards other than Boons, Daedalus Hammer, or rare resources, a copy may appear.

PoseidonStatusBoon.name: Slippery Slope
PoseidonStatusBoon.description: Your splash effects from Poseidon also inflict Froth, and Froth deals more damage.

PoseidonExCastBoon.name: Geyser Spout
PoseidonExCastBoon.description: Your Omega Cast gains Power and knocks foes away.

OmegaPoseidonProjectileBoon.name: Ocean Swell
OmegaPoseidonProjectileBoon.description: Your Omega Moves also launch a wide wave ahead that knocks foes away, but use +5 Magick.

AmplifyConeBoon.name: King Tide
AmplifyConeBoon.description: Your splash effects from Poseidon are larger and deal bonus damage to Guardians.

ZeusCastBoon.name: Storm Ring
ZeusCastBoon.description: Your Casts cause lightning bolts to repeatedly strike 1 foe at a time in the binding circle.

ZeusSprintBoon.name: Thunder Rush
ZeusSprintBoon.description: Dashing causes surrounding foes to be struck by lightning bolts.

ZeusManaBoon.name: Ionic Gain
ZeusManaBoon.description: In each Encounter, an Aether Font appears in the area and restores all Magick when used.

ZeusManaBoltBoon.name: Power Surge
ZeusManaBoltBoon.description: Whenever you use Magick, a random surrounding foe is struck by lightning.

BoltRetaliateBoon.name: Divine Vengeance
BoltRetaliateBoon.description: After you take damage, your foe is struck by lightning, and again 50% of the time.

CastAnywhereBoon.name: Lightning Lance
CastAnywhereBoon.description: Hold Cast to aim where the binding circle appears. Foes within are struck by lightning.

FocusLightningBoon.name: Static Shock
FocusLightningBoon.description: Your strikes emit chain-lightning that bounces up to 4 times, but you Prime 50 Magick.

DoubleBoltBoon.name: Double Strike
DoubleBoltBoon.description: Your lightning bolt effects may strike 2 more times.

EchoExpirationBoon.name: Arc Flash
EchoExpirationBoon.description:
Damage from

Omega Moves

immediately activates

Blitz

effects and makes them stronger.

LightningDebuffGeneratorBoon.name: Electric Overload
LightningDebuffGeneratorBoon.description: Your chain-lightning deals more damage and bounces up to +3 times.

ElementalDamageFloorBoon.name: Air Quality
ElementalDamageFloorBoon.description: While you have at least 5 Air, you can never deal less damage than the limit.

SpawnKillBoon.name: Shocking Loss
SpawnKillBoon.description: Whenever you first deal damage to susceptible foes, you may destroy them outright.
